definition: to serve as the norm/...shall prevail (as standard for rules, regulations, price etc)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to allow/to grant/in accordance with/in the light of

sentences.english: All the quotation on the list are subject to our final confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 单中所有价格以我方最后确认为准。

sentences.english: Ms. priority is a well-known code of conduct.
sentences.chinese: 女士优先是一个人人皆知的行为准则。

sentences.english: If explanation meets any diverges, the english version shall prevail.
sentences.chinese: 如果解释上遇分歧，应以英文本为准。

sentences.english: All product price and information is subject to in store display.
sentences.chinese: 所有货品价格及资料以店内陈列为准。

sentences.english: These tables are for reference only. The exact tariff should refer to the Customs of China.
sentences.chinese: 此计算方式只供参考使用，详细以海关为准。

sentences.english: No appeal will be accepted. The decisions of the referee on the spot will be final.
sentences.chinese: 大会不设上诉，一切赛果以当场裁判员的决定为准。

sentences.english: If there was difference in interpretation, that should be right in English.
sentences.chinese: 如在解释上遇有分歧，应以英文本为准。

sentences.english: The fees have to be paid in Renminbi according to the relevant consular exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 签证费必须以人民币支付，以使馆汇率为准。

sentences.english: The demographics of the residents subject to the basic ledger.
sentences.chinese: 该人口统计以居民基本台账为准。

sentences.english: If there are any argument or change, Tuen Mun Canoe Club will make the final judgment.
sentences.chinese: 改及争议，以屯门独木舟会最终决定为准。

sentences.english: This offer is subject to the goods being unsold.
sentences.chinese: 本盘以货物未售出为准。

sentences.english: The final construction scale is subject to the ratified reply of Development and Reform Bureau of Baoan District.
sentences.chinese: 最终建设规模以宝安区发展和改革局立项批复为准。

sentences.english: Anything not mentioned in this clause, please go to the primary clause.
sentences.chinese: 本条款未尽事宜，以主险条款为准。

sentences.english: Amendment to the above schedule is possible, please refer to notice board on-site for updated information.
sentences.chinese: 以上活动安排可能有变动，最新情况以现场告示为准。

sentences.english: The offer is subject to prior sale.
sentences.chinese: 该报盘以未出售前为准。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the cyclic Voltammetry curve of gingerol indicated that the reaction was half reversible process.
sentences.chinese: 姜辣素的循环伏安扫描曲线表现为准可逆反应。

definition: to notify at a different time/to notify later/to give prior notice
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to state explicitly in writing/to specify/to stipulate
according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]
